Try:

<junit printsummary="yes" fork="yes" haltonfailure="no" dir="D:/src">
  <formatter type="plain"/>
     <test name="TempTest" outfile="result">
  </test>
</junit>

I assume you're compiling your classes to the source directory .. ?  If not, you need to point to the directory where the .class files are found, not where the .java files are.

Cheers,
Craig

>>> jsdk00@... 11/27/02 04:53am >>>

please ?

<junit printsummary="yes" fork="yes" haltonfailure="no">    
  <formatter type="plain"/>
     <test name="D:/src/TempTest"  outfile="result">
  </test>
  </junit>

  </target>
